content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES
--------------------
No new structures have been successfully placed on the map. Multiple attempts were made to create a Lab at (0.5, 2.5) for supplying Automation Science Packs to research; however, none succeeded because of inventory shortages and crafting issues. In addition, the agent interacted with pre‐existing furnace structures to support smelting operations:
• Iron Smelting Furnace at Position(5.0, 5.0) – used to convert iron ore and coal into iron plates.
• Copper Smelting Furnace at Position(–27.0, –60.0) – used to convert copper ore and coal into copper plates.
(Note: These furnaces were retrieved from the map rather than built by the agent.)

ERROR TIPS
----------
• API Usage Errors:
 – When calling get_entities(), use only supported parameters. Remove unexpected keyword arguments (such as “radius”) or excess positional parameters to match the API signature.
• Lab Placement Issues:
 – Verify that a lab is present in the inventory before attempting to place it at a target position.
 – Confirm that the intended placement tile is free and accessible.
• Iteration Safety:
 – Check that objects returned from API calls (e.g. the list of existing labs) are not None before iterating.
• Crafting Resource Shortages:
 – Ensure that all required sub-ingredients (for example, iron-gear-wheels, electronic-circuits, copper-cables) are available in sufficient quantities before attempting to craft a lab.
 – Validate that the entire crafting chain (including prerequisite smelting or assembly processes) is functional.
• Fallback Strategies:
 – When using fallback approaches, default to safe values (such as an empty list) to prevent type errors due to unexpected None values.
